trans-unit.source: Provides a synchronous HTTP handler that processes requests for tracing information.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个同步 HTTP 处理程序，它可处理跟踪信息的请求。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the <see cref="T:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示其他请求是否可以使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object that provides access to the current <see langword="Request" /> and <see langword="Response" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 对象，它提供对当前 <see langword="Request" /> 和 <see langword="Response" /> 实例的访问。

trans-unit.source: Processes an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 处理 HTTP 请求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method writes an <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> that includes all current trace information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法写入<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>它包含所有当前的跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: The trace information includes calls to the `protected`<xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowDetails%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowRequests%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowVersionDetails%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪信息包括对调用`protected` <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowDetails%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowRequests%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowVersionDetails%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler> class implements the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method to delegate to the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler>类实现<xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法的实现委托<xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you extend the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler> class, implement your own <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method to display different tracing information.
trans-unit.target: 如果扩展<xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler>类中，实现您自己<xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>方法以显示不同的跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> object that contains tracing information.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含跟踪信息的 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Writes the details of the current system state and page information to the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 将当前系统状态和页信息的详细信息写入响应流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowDetails%2A> method writes tracing details to the response stream, including information about the application state, session state for the current session, control tree created for the current page, and HTTP request information such as the query string and form parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowDetails%2A>方法将跟踪详细信息写入到响应流，包括应用程序状态，当前会话中，会话状态的信息控制树创建为当前页上和 HTTP 请求的信息，例如查询字符串和窗体参数。

trans-unit.source: It is called by <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>, and cannot be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>，并且不能被重写。

trans-unit.source: A set of <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> objects that represent the recent HTTP requests the server has processed.
trans-unit.target: 一组 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 对象，表示服务器最近处理的 HTTP 请求。

trans-unit.source: Writes the details of recent HTTP request traffic to the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 向响应流写入最近的 HTTP 请求通信的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowRequests%2A> method writes tracing details to the response stream, including information on the most recent HTTP requests that ASP.NET has processed for the site.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowRequests%2A>方法将跟踪详细信息写入响应流中，包括有关最新 ASP.NET 为该站点已处理的 HTTP 请求的信息。

trans-unit.source: It is called by <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>, and cannot be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>，并且不能被重写。

trans-unit.source: Writes the details of the current Common Language Runtime and ASP.NET build versions that the Web server is using.
trans-unit.target: 写入 Web 服务器正在使用的当前公共语言运行时和 ASP.NET 内部版本的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowVersionDetails%2A> method writes tracing details on the Common Language Runtime (CLR) and ASP.NET versions currently in use.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ShowVersionDetails%2A>方法写入跟踪详细信息上当前正在使用的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 和 ASP.NET 版本。

trans-unit.source: It is called by <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>, and cannot be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 它由<xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler.ProcessRequest%2A>，并且不能被重写。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the <see cref="T:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示其他请求是否可以使用 <see cref="T:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit-interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.Handlers.TraceHandler> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object that provides access to the current <see langword="Request" /> and <see langword="Response" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 对象，它提供对当前 <see langword="Request" /> 和 <see langword="Response" /> 实例的访问。

trans-unit.source: Processes an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 处理 HTTP 请求。

trans-unit.source: This method writes all current trace information to the <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将所有当前的跟踪信息写入<xref:System.Web.HttpResponse>。

trans-unit.source: The trace information includes information on the state of the Web server, the current session, the control tree for the current page, HTTP request parameters, and recent HTTP requests processed by the server.
trans-unit.target: 跟踪信息包括状态的 Web 服务器、 当前会话、 当前页、 HTTP 请求参数和最近服务器处理的 HTTP 请求的控制树的信息。
